title: Structure and Liquidity in Treasury Markets
content: - 8 -      discuss Treasury market structure.  In fact, that is one of the recommendations in the October 15   report released last month.  The conference will take place this fall at the Federal Reserve Bank of   New York, in cooperation with the Treasury Department, the Board of Governors, the Securities   and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.  My hope and   expectation is that it will bring market participants and regulators closer to an understanding of   whether there are changes in trading and risk management practices, regulation and market   structure that could make our Treasury markets even more liquid and more resilient.
